item.description:
Ladies and Gents,

For any of you who have no plans on New Year's Eve, we would like to invite you over to our apartment to bring in the new year!

Feel free to bring any food or drink that you like, and we will make sure there's plenty of snacks as well.

If anyone knows how to make Japanese New Year's food, I will be glad to help you prepare it over at my apartment before the party starts.

This party is casual, come whenever you like!

Directions:
By Subway:

1) Please take the Red Line Outbound train toward BRAINTREE (not Ashmont)
2) Get off at N. Quincy Station
3) When exiting the train, turn right, walk through the metal/glass doors, and through the ticket gates.
4) Turn left and walk out the exit doors
5) Turn right, and walk toward the road (West Squantum St).
6) Cross the Street onto Holmes St (there's a crosswalk, but BE CAREFUL of traffic!!!).
7) Take a left on Moscow St (I like to think that everyone's a communist on that street).
8) Take a slight right onto Hancock Street. You will have a 711 right next to you.
9) At the yellow blinking light, cross the street onto Glover Ave.
10) Take a right onto Felton St.
11) Enter our apartment on the right, and provide your hosts with expensive gifts (everyone always ignores this step! :P). Our house. has an outside porch, a white metal railing, and a black mailbox right in front. I will have our porch light on as well.

Map from North Quincy Station:
http://web.mit.edu/~r...

For directions by car, it may be best to use google maps. For those of you who will be driving, please feel free to e-mail me for any further assistance.

PLEASE RSVP if you plan on attending!

See you soon,

Rob
item.how_to_find_us: Well, it's at my apartment, so it should be fairly easy to find me.
item.why: Because Will and I are two wild and crazy guys! That's a good reason, right?
item.name: New Years Party for Anyone Still Here! Directions Now Added!
